trans-unit.source: Provides a customizable activity designer surface for users to visually modify on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una superficie dell'ActivityDesigner personalizzabile che gli utenti possono modificare visivamente su una superficie di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> allows users to modify how an activity appears on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> consente agli utenti di modificare la modalità di visualizzazione di un'attività su una superficie di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: When you associate <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> with a custom activity class using the `Designer` attribute, the custom activity's appearance is different from other activities when a user drops the custom activity onto a design surface.
trans-unit.target: Quando si associa <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> a una classe di attività personalizzata utilizzando l'attributo `Designer`, l'aspetto dell'attività personalizzata è diverso da quello di altre attività quando un utente rilascia l'attività personalizzata su un'area di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: Once <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> displays an activity on the design surface, users can draw connectors to other activity designers and resize the designer within the parameters defined by the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> visualizza un'attività sull'area di progettazione, gli utenti possono disegnare connettori ad altri ActivityDesigner e ridimensionare la finestra di progettazione all'interno dei parametri definiti dall'area di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: Users can only add connectors to the custom activity because the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is associated with the top-level activity in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: Gli utenti possono aggiungere connettori solo all'attività personalizzata, in quanto l'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> è associato all'attività di livello superiore in un flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that accessibility applications use to adjust the application UI for users who have impairments.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> utilizzata dalle applicazioni di accessibilità per modificare l'interfaccia utente dell'applicazione per utenti diversamente abili.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> associato al controllo.

trans-unit.source: If no `AccessibleObject` is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
trans-unit.target: Se al controllo non viene assegnato alcun oggetto `AccessibleObject`, ne viene creata una nuova istanza.

trans-unit.source: To get or set the `AccessibilityObject` property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere o impostare la proprietà `AccessibilityObject`, è necessario aggiungere un riferimento all'assembly Accessibility installato con .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For more information about accessible objects, see the Active Accessibility section of the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sugli oggetti accessibili, vedere la sezione Active Accessibility di MSDN Library.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> location to begin drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Percorso di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> da cui iniziare a disegnare il connettore.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> location to finish drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Percorso di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> in cui terminare di disegnare il connettore.

trans-unit.source: Adds a connector to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un connettore alla classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> that was added to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> aggiunto alla classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AddConnector%2A> is called when a user adds a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AddConnector%2A> viene chiamato quando un utente aggiunge un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> alla classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the `AddConnnector` method in a custom activity designer's `OnLayoutPosition` method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il metodo `AddConnnector` nel metodo `OnLayoutPosition` di un ActivityDesigner personalizzato.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="target" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> o <paramref name="target" /> contiene un riferimento <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner" /> property for <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="target" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner" /> per <paramref name="source" /> o <paramref name="target" /> contiene un riferimento <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" />).

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> is not the container for the connector to add.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> corrente non è il contenitore che il connettore deve aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> is resized automatically when a user resizes the designer's child designers.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> viene ridimensionato automaticamente quando un utente ridimensiona le finestre di progettazione figlio della finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> is resized automatically; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> viene ridimensionata automaticamente. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: When you set <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>, il layout dell'oggetto della classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> viene aggiornato.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the margin size to render around the child designers when the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> is automatically resized.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta le dimensioni del margine per eseguire il rendering delle finestre di progettazione figlio quando la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> viene ridimensionata automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the size of the margin to render around the child designers of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> che rappresenta le dimensioni del margine per eseguire il rendering delle finestre di progettazione figlio della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The default size of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMargin%2A> is a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> object with dimensions of 40 pixels by 40 pixels.
trans-unit.target: La dimensione predefinita di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMargin%2A> è un oggetto <xref:System.Drawing.Size> con dimensioni di 40 pixel per 40 pixel.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property associated with the current workflow theme is set to `true`, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMargin%2A> settings are half the height and half the width of the grid size.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> associata al tema del flusso di lavoro corrente è impostata su `true`, le impostazioni di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMargin%2A> rappresentano la metà dell'altezza e la metà della larghezza delle dimensioni della griglia.

trans-unit.source: When you set <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMargin%2A>, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMargin%2A>, il layout dell'oggetto della classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> viene aggiornato.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> settings for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o definisce le impostazioni dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> per la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The default setting is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione predefinita è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly" />.

trans-unit.source: The default behavior of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> allows the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to grow as necessary to fit its contents but does not shrink smaller than the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il comportamento predefinito di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> consente a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> di ingrandirsi per adattarsi al contenuto ma non di ridursi fino a diventare più piccolo del valore della proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: When you set <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>, il layout dell'oggetto della classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> viene aggiornato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to bring to the top of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> da portare nella parte superiore dello z-order.

trans-unit.source: Brings the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to the top of the z-order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Porta l'elemento <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> specificato nella parte superiore dello z-order della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.BringToFront%2A> modifies the z-order for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to display the specified <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> as its top visible child designer.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.BringToFront%2A> modifica lo z-order per far sì che <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> visualizzi l'elemento <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> specificato come relativa finestra di progettazione figlio visibile superiore.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to display a designer at the top of the z-order when a user selects it.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questo metodo per visualizzare una finestra di progettazione nella parte superiore dello z-order quando viene selezionato da un utente.

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.BringToFront%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro `containedDesigner` deve trovarsi in un elemento figlio di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> prima che venga eseguita la chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.BringToFront%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If it is not, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.BringToFront%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.BringToFront%2A> genera una classe <xref:System.ArgumentException>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contiene un riferimento <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> is not found in the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> non è presente nell'insieme <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> to check on the source activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> da controllare nell'ActivityDesigner di origine.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> to check on the target activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> da controllare nell'ActivityDesigner di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> can create a connection between the specified connection point on a source child activity designer and the specified connection point on a target child activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> può creare una connessione tra il punto di connessione specificato su un ActivityDesigner figlio di origine e il punto di connessione specificato su un ActivityDesigner figlio di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> can draw a connector between source and target activity designers; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> può disegnare un connettore tra ActivityDesigner di origine e di destinazione. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> can be collapsed on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> può essere compresso in un'area di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> can be collapsed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> può essere compressa. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.CanExpandCollapse%2A> always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.CanExpandCollapse%2A> restituisce sempre `false`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to check.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> da verificare.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a user can visually resize the specified child activity designer in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se un utente può ridimensionare visivamente l'ActivityDesigner figlio specificato nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a user can visually resize the specified activity designer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se un utente può ridimensionare visivamente l'ActivityDesigner specificato. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.CanResizeContainedDesigner%2A> returns `true` if `containedDesigner` is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: A meno che non venga sottoposto a overridde in una classe derivata, il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.CanResizeContainedDesigner%2A> restituisce `true` se `containedDesigner` è un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Other types of designers cannot be resized.
trans-unit.target: Non è possibile ridimensionare altri tipi di finestre di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> is added to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando un elemento <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> viene aggiunto a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorAdded%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorAdded%2A> è il gestore eventi delegati registrato per l'evento <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user changes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> locations associated with a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> displayed by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: SI verifica quando un utente modifica i percorsi di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> associati a un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> visualizzato dalla classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A connector is changed when a user changes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> locations at either end of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> object.
trans-unit.target: Un connettore viene modificato quando un utente modifica i percorsi di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> in una delle estremità di un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorChanged%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorChanged%2A> è il gestore eventi delegati registrato per l'evento <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user removes a connector from the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando l'utente rimuove un connettore dal controllo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> è il gestore eventi delegati registrato per l'evento <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of connectors that are associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di sola lettura di connettori associati alla classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection that contains all <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> objects associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di sola lettura che contiene tutti gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> associati all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A connector is the line that appears on a workflow design surface that connects one activity designer to another.
trans-unit.target: Per connettore si intende la linea visualizzata su un superficie di progettazione del flusso di lavoro che connette tra loro più ActivityDesigner.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> location to begin drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Percorso di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> da cui iniziare a disegnare il connettore.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> location to finish drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Percorso di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> in cui terminare di disegnare il connettore.

trans-unit.source: Creates a connector between the two specified connection points.
trans-unit.target: Crea un connettore tra i due punti di connessione specificati.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> that was created.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> che è stato creato.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer is being disposed; <see langword="false" /> if the designer is being finalized.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se la finestra di progettazione viene eliminata; <see langword="false" /> se viene completata.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> e, facoltativamente, le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can drag and draw connectors on the free-form activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se gli utenti possono trascinare e disegnare connettori sull'area dell'ActivityDesigner in formato libero.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if users can drag and draw connectors on the free-form activity designer surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se gli utenti possono trascinare e disegnare connettori sulla superficie dell'ActivityDesigner in formato libero. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> can be visually resized on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> può essere ridimensionata visivamente sull'area di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> can be visually resized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> può essere ridimensionata visivamente. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.EnableVisualResizing%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se la classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> è impostata su `true` e la classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.EnableVisualResizing%2A> restituisce `false`.

trans-unit.source: In all other conditions <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.EnableVisualResizing%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: In tutte le altre condizioni <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.EnableVisualResizing%2A> restituisce `true`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il primo oggetto selezionabile nell'ordine di navigazione della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The first selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Primo oggetto selezionabile nell'ordine di navigazione della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> returns the first child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection, or a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the collection count is zero.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> restituisce la prima finestra di progettazione figlio nella raccolta <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> o un riferimento `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) se il numero di raccolte è pari a zero.

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Object" /> in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> corrente nell'ordine di navigazione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection" /> enumeration value that determines the navigation order of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Valore di enumerazione <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection" /> che determina l'ordine di navigazione della finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il primo oggetto selezionabile che segue l'oggetto specificato nell'ordine di navigazione della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The first selectable <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that follows the <paramref name="obj" /> parameter in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Primo oggetto selezionabile <see cref="T:System.Object" /> che segue il parametro <paramref name="obj" /> nell'ordine di navigazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of glyphs that are displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di icone visualizzate nella classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> that contains the glyphs displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> contenente le icone visualizzate in <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Glyphs%2A> returns a glyph for each connectable child designer found on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Glyphs%2A> restituisce un'icona per ogni finestra di progettazione figlio trovata su <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that contains the coordinates on the workflow design surface from which to gather information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> che contiene le coordinate nella superficie di progettazione del flusso di lavoro da cui raccogliere informazioni.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the <see langword="FreeformActivityDesigner" /> at the specified coordinates on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce informazioni su <see langword="FreeformActivityDesigner" /> alle coordinate specificate nella superficie di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> that contains information about the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> at the specified coordinates
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> contenente informazioni sull'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> alle coordinate specificate

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> checks whether the location has occurred on a connector or one of the child activity designers.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> controlla se il percorso si trova su un connettore o su uno degli ActivityDesigner figlio.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> occurs on a child activity that is being dragged to another location, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> returns information about the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, not the designer being moved.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> si trova su un'attività figlio trascinata in un altro percorso, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> restituisce informazioni sulla classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, non sulla finestra di progettazione spostata.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> with which to initialize the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Elemento <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> con cui inizializzare la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> utilizzando l'elemento <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: `Initialize` adds a designer property extender to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> for it to use until the design surface is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: `Initialize` aggiunge un'estensione delle proprietà della finestra di progettazione all'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> affinché questo possa utilizzarla fino a quando l'area di progettazione non viene eliminata in modo permanente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> that specifies the location to add the activities.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> che specifica il percorso per aggiungere le attività.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> read-only collection that contains the activities to add to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di sola lettura di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> contenente le attività da aggiungere alla classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified read-only collection of activities to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> at the specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge la raccolta di sola lettura specificata delle attività a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> nel percorso specificato sulla superficie di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'ultimo oggetto selezionabile nell'ordine di navigazione di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Elemento <see cref="T:System.Object" /> che rappresenta l'ultimo oggetto selezionabile nell'ordine di navigazione della finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> returns the last child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> property or a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> does not contain any child designers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> restituisce l'ultima finestra di progettazione figlio nella proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> o un riferimento `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) se l'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> non contiene alcuna finestra di progettazione figlio.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il percorso della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> in coordinate logiche.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Point" /> that represents the location of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see langword="Point" /> che rappresenta il percorso dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> in coordinate logiche.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Location%2A> is set due to a user resizing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, the designer maintains the relative positions of its child designers.
trans-unit.target: Quando la classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Location%2A> viene impostata mentre un utente ridimensiona l'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, la finestra di progettazione mantiene le posizioni relative delle finestre di progettazione figlio.

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum size settings for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le impostazioni relative alle dimensioni minime per la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the smallest possible size for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> che rappresenta le dimensioni più piccole possibili per la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Location to move activities to.
trans-unit.target: Posizione in cui spostare le attività.

trans-unit.source: Collection that contains the activities to move to <c>moveLocation.</c>
trans-unit.target: Raccolta che contiene le attività da spostare in <c>moveLocation</c>.

trans-unit.source: Moves activities to a specified location within the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Sposta le attività in una posizione specificata all'interno dell'area di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to move.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> da spostare.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that represents the designer's new location.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> che rappresenta il nuovo percorso della finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: Moves the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Sposta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> specificato nel percorso specificato.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MoveContainedDesigner%2A> sets new bounds for the moved designer and performs all required layout operations for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MoveContainedDesigner%2A> imposta nuovi limiti per la finestra di progettazione spostata ed esegue tutte le operazioni di layout obbligatorie per la classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> sulla superficie di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MoveContainedDesigner%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro `containedDesigner` deve trovarsi in un elemento figlio di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> prima che venga eseguita la chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MoveContainedDesigner%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If it is not, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MoveContainedDesigner%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MoveContainedDesigner%2A> genera una classe <xref:System.ArgumentException>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contiene un riferimento <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> is not found in the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> non è presente nell'insieme <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera l'evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera l'evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: A connector is changed when a user changes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> locations at either end of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> object.
trans-unit.target: Un connettore viene modificato quando un utente modifica i percorsi di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> in una delle estremità di un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera l'evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" /> that contains information about the added or removed activities.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" /> che contiene informazioni sulle attività aggiunte o rimosse.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> when a child activity is added or deleted from its <see langword="Activities" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Invia una notifica all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> quando un'attività figlio viene aggiunta o eliminata dalla relativa raccolta <see langword="Activities" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> location to begin drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Percorso di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> da cui iniziare a disegnare il connettore.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> location to finish drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Percorso di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> in cui terminare di disegnare il connettore.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> when a connection has been established between two of its contained activity designers.
trans-unit.target: Notifica a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> quando una connessione è stata stabilita tra due degli ActivityDesigner contenuti.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnContainedDesignersConnected%2A> is called when a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> is drawn between the source on one of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> object's contained activity designers to target on a second contained activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnContainedDesignersConnected%2A> viene chiamato quando un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> viene disegnato tra l'origine in uno degli ActivityDesigner contenuti dell'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> e la destinazione in un secondo ActivityDesigner contenuto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> che definisce gli argomenti dell'evento operazione.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> when a drag-drop operation is completed within the bounds of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: Notifica a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> quando un'operazione di trascinamento della selezione viene completata entro i limiti della relativa superficie di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> che definisce gli argomenti dell'evento operazione.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor is inside the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Notifica all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> quando è in corso un'operazione di trascinamento e il cursore del mouse dell'utente è all'interno dei limiti della finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed when the designer has the keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando si preme un tasto mentre la finestra di progettazione presenta lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> che definisce gli argomenti dell'evento operazione.

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Esegue attività di layout per posizionare segnali visivi e finestre di progettazione figlio su <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> che definisce gli argomenti dell'evento operazione.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> when the size of the visual cues on the designers displayed by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> have changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> quando la dimensione dei segnali visivi nelle finestre di progettazione visualizzate da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> viene modificata.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the new size of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> che rappresenta le nuove dimensioni di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> sulla superficie di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> returns the size of the current bounding rectangle for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> when <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> restituisce le dimensioni del rettangolo di delimitazione corrente per <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> quando la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> è impostata su `false`.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> calculates and returns new size settings for the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> è impostata su `true` e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> calcola e restituisce nuove impostazioni delle dimensioni per il rettangolo di delimitazione.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to true and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> returns <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> è impostata su True e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> non è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink?displayProperty=nameWithType>, il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> restituisce <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs" /> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs" /> che definisce gli argomenti dell'evento operazione.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> when a user is visually resizing it at design time.
trans-unit.target: Invia una notifica a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> quando un utente ne esegue il ridimensionamento visivo in fase di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnResizing%2A> performs all resizing tasks on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> è impostata su `true` e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>, il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnResizing%2A> esegue tutte le attività di ridimensionamento sulla superficie di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnResizing%2A> performs layout tasks, but no resizing tasks.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> è impostata su `true` e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink?displayProperty=nameWithType>, il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnResizing%2A> esegue tutte le attività di layout, ma non quelle di ridimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `false`, all contained designers retain their previous locations on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> è impostata su `false`, tutte le finestre di progettazione contenute conservano i percorsi precedenti su <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> that contains the updated theme property settings.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> contenente le impostazioni aggiornate relative alle proprietà del tema.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> that its associated theme has changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> la modifica del tema associato.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnThemeChange%2A> always sets the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A> property to an empty string and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> property to `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: A meno che non venga sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnThemeChange%2A> imposta sempre la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A> su una stringa vuota e la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> su `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A> is set to `true`, the locations of each child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is snapped to the nearest grid line.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A> è impostata su `true`, i percorsi di ogni finestra di progettazione figlio in <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> vengono bloccati sulla linea della griglia più vicina.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> specificato dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.RemoveConnector%2A> deletes the specified connector from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Connectors%2A> collection and calls the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.RemoveConnector%2A> elimina il connettore specificato dalla raccolta <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Connectors%2A> e chiama il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="connector" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="connector" /> contiene un riferimento <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to resize.
trans-unit.target: Elemento <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> da ridimensionare.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the new dimensions of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> che rappresenta le nuove dimensioni della finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: Resizes the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to the dimensions of specified size.
trans-unit.target: Ridimensiona l'elemento <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> specificato portandolo alle dimensioni specificate.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ResizeContainedDesigner%2A> sets new bounds for the resized designer and performs all required layout operations for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ResizeContainedDesigner%2A> imposta nuovi limiti per la finestra di progettazione ridimensionata ed esegue tutte le operazioni di layout obbligatorie per <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> sulla superficie di progettazione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ResizeContainedDesigner%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro `containedDesigner` deve trovarsi in un elemento figlio di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> prima che venga eseguita la chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ResizeContainedDesigner%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If it is not, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ResizeContainedDesigner%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ResizeContainedDesigner%2A> genera una classe <xref:System.ArgumentException>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contiene un riferimento <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> is not found in the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> non è presente nell'insieme <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to set to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> da impostare sulla parte posteriore dello z-order.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to the bottom of the z-order of the <see langword="FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Imposta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> specificato nella parte inferiore dello z-order di <see langword="FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.SendToBack%2A> modifies the z-order for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to display the specified <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> as the bottom visible designer on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.SendToBack%2A> modifica lo z-order per far sì che <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> visualizzi l'elemento <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> specificato come finestra di progettazione visibile inferiore sulla superficie di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to display a designer at the bottom of the z-order when a user deselects it.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questo metodo per visualizzare una finestra di progettazione nella parte inferiore dello z-order quando viene deselezionato da un utente.

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.SendToBack%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro `containedDesigner` deve trovarsi in un elemento figlio di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> prima che venga eseguita la chiamata a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.SendToBack%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If it is not, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.SendToBack%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.SendToBack%2A> genera una classe <xref:System.ArgumentException>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contiene un riferimento <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> is not found in the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> non è presente nell'insieme <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> draws connectors in the foreground of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> disegna connettori al livello di primo piano dell'area di progettazione corrispondente.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> draws connectors in the foreground of its design surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> disegna connettori nel primo piano della relativa superficie di progettazione. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a class that derives from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ShowConnectorsInForeground%2A> always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: A meno che non venga sottoposto a override in una classe che deriva da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, l'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ShowConnectorsInForeground%2A> restituisce sempre `false`.
